entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: NW 35 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
